```pddl
[
    '(:action cut ; Cut an item and update its state
    :parameters (?p - person ?item - object ?surface - surface ?tool - tool)
    :precondition (and (at ?p ?surface) (at ?item ?surface) (has ?p ?tool) (whole ?item))
    :effect (and (cut ?item) (not (whole ?item)))',
    
    '(:action set ; Set an entity's state
    :parameters (?p - person ?entity - object ?state - state)
    :precondition (and (at ?p ?entity) (not (in_state ?entity ?state)))
    :effect (and (in_state ?entity ?state)))',
    
    '(:action melt ; Melt a generic item, updating its state and temperature
    :parameters (?p - person ?item - object ?container - container ?heat_source - heat_source)
    :precondition (and (at ?p ?container) (in ?item ?container) (on ?heat_source) (temperature ?heat_source medium-low) (state ?item solid))
    :effect (and (melted ?item) (temperature ?item hot) (state ?item liquid)))',
    
    '(:action add ; Add an ingredient to a sauce pan
    :parameters (?p - person ?item - ingredient ?sauce_pan - sauce_pan)
    :precondition (and (at ?p ?sauce_pan) 
                       (or (in ?item ?can) (chopped ?item) (desirable ?item)) 
                       (melted ?velveeta))
    :effect (and (in ?item ?sauce_pan) 
                 (not (in ?item ?can))))',
    
    '(:action serve ; Serve a prepared consumable item
    :parameters (?p - person ?item - consumable ?container - container ?location_from - location ?location_to - location)
    :precondition (and (at ?p ?location_from) (in ?item ?location_from) (prepared ?item))
    :effect (and (in ?item ?container) (served ?item) (at ?p ?location_to)))'
]
```
